helpgrid.innerhtml:
Selecting this option will display records from all sites the asset has resided in during its life.
If this option is not selected, the asset history will only display records for the current site.

table.label: Work Order Statuses That Can Prevent Work Order Duplication

helpgrid.innerhtml: Specify work order statuses that could prevent creation of duplicate work orders during processing of telematics codes. List any work order status that processing should interpret as "A work order already exists for this asset, code, and create-work-order action. If Prevent Duplicate Work Orders is selected for the associated telematics code, do not create a duplicate work order." An existing work order in any status that is not listed here would not prevent creation of a new work order, regardless of the setting of Prevent Duplicate Work Orders for the associated code.

Specify allowable asset statuses for assets that are in specified positions in an operational consist. A consist cannot be made operational if it has any position-specific assets that have a status that is not in the list of allowed statuses.

table.label: Allowed Asset Statuses for Operational Consists
